thread.title: Summer Cowley
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Summer Cowley

author: Summer Cowley
title: Summer Cowley
text: My daughter and I had the best experience at Peaches. Customer service was amazing, (thanks Melissa, you were awesome), the facility was beautiful and well organized. For a place that frequents a lot of customers, the structure was great, I call it controlled chaos. The choices are endless and did I mention the customer service...to die for!!. Peaches is a one stop shop. So, if you've been shopping around and you end up at Peaches, let me tell you to look no further, everything you need is under one roof and your satisfaction is guaranteed. To boot, we walked in and about an hour later, we walked out with the dress of her dreams even with minor alterations, where do you find that!. Best experience dress shopping for prom!!
